```{python}
for item in items:
  item['start_dt'] = datetime.fromisoformat(item['start'])
  item['end_dt'] = datetime.fromisoformat(item['end'])

df = pd.DataFrame(items)
df.sort_values(by='start_dt', inplace=True)
```

```{python}
#| output: asis
# See https://bootswatch.com/ for Theme classes

for date in [
  date(2025, 6, 22),
  date(2025, 6, 23),
  date(2025, 6, 24),
  date(2025, 6, 25),
  date(2025, 6, 26),
  date(2025, 6, 27),
]:

  df_day = df[date == df["start_dt"].dt.date]
  display(Markdown(f"\n# {date.strftime("%A %d %B")}"""))
  display(Markdown(f"\n### {len(df_day)} events"""))
  for idx, row in df_day.iterrows():
    desc = f'{row.title}' if isinstance(row.title, str) else ''
    if isinstance(row.session_id, str):
      event_url = f'{BASE_URL}programme/programme-session/?id={row.session_id}'
      event_title_html = f'<a href="{event_url}" class="card-link">{desc}</a>'
    else:
      event_url = ''
      event_title_html = desc
    location = f'({row.location})' if pd.notna(row.location) else ''

    calendar_daterange = f"{row.start_dt.strftime('%Y%m%dT%H%M%S%z')}/{row.end_dt.strftime('%Y%m%dT%H%M%S%z')}"
    calendar_url = (
      f"https://calendar.google.com/calendar/render?action=TEMPLATE"
      f"&text={row.title}"
      f"&dates={calendar_daterange}"
      f"&ctz=Europe/Vienna"
      f"&details=LPS Website link: <a href='{event_url}'>{row.title}</a>"
      f"&location={row.location.replace(' ', '+')}"
    )
    display(HTML(f"""
      <div class="card border-primary mb-3">
        <div class="card-header">
          {row.start_dt.strftime("%A %d %B")}
          {row.start_dt.strftime("%H:%M")} - {row.end_dt.strftime("%H:%M")}
          {location}
        </div>
        <div class="card-body">
          <h4 class="card-title">{row.type.title()}: {event_title_html}</h4>
          <p class="card-text">
            <span class="text-success">{' '.join(['#' + tag for tag in row.tags])}</span>
            <br/>
            <a href="{calendar_url}" class="text-info">Add to Google Calendar</a>
            </p>
          </p>
        </div>

      </div>
    """))
```
